panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: System load  over all CPU cores together
panels.title: Sys Load

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr: avg(smartctl_device_temperature{monitor="$monitor"} * on(monitor,device) group_left(interface,serial_number,model_name) smartctl_device) by (monitor,device,model_name) unless on(monitor,device) (smartctl_device_attribute{attribute_name="Start_Stop_Count", attribute_value_type="raw"} > 0)

avg(smartctl_device_temperature{monitor="$monitor"} * on(monitor, device) group_left(interface,serial_number,model_name) smartctl_device) by (monitor,device,model_name) and on(monitor, device) (smartctl_device_attribute{attribute_name="Start_Stop_Count", attribute_value_type="raw"} > 0)
